neighbors.name: Steven J. & Francesca Brennan
neighbors.claims: Steven J. Brennan and his wife Francesca are listed as owners of a parcel in Cochise County. Public records indicate they also own residential property in Tucson, Arizona, specifically at Mariposa Woods Place, suggesting they are absentee landowners ([Zillow](https://www.zillow.com/homedetails/1632-N-Mariposa-Woods-Pl-309-Tucson-AZ-85749/455799539_zpid/)). No record of local civic engagement or publicly stated views on development in Cochise County could be verified.
neighbors.influence_justification: Absentee owners based in Tucson; no local political footprint found

approach_recommendations.engage: Contact them via phone or email, emphasizing how the project could maintain or enhance property values and minimize any impact on their land.

citations.claim: Public records indicate they also own residential property in Tucson, Arizona, specifically at Mariposa Woods Place
citations.title: 1632 N Mariposa Woods Pl, Tucson, AZ 85749

neighbors.name: Lodestar Investments LC
neighbors.claims: Lodestar Investments LC is a limited liability company listed as the owner of parcel 106-15-012T in Cochise County. The entity appears to hold the land for investment purposes, with no identified local operational footprint ([AZCC](https://ecorp.azcc.gov/BusinessSearch/BusinessInfo?entityNumber=23247916)). While a mining company named Lodestar Minerals has operations in Arizona (Virgin Mountain Project), no direct link to this specific LLC in Cochise County could be verified ([Lodestar Minerals](https://www.lodestarminerals.com.au/)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Corporate entity with opaque ownership; no known local representative

approach_recommendations.engage: If needed, reach the companyâ€™s representative through formal channels, focusing on business considerations and regulatory compliance.

neighbors.name: Patsy J. Moriarty
neighbors.claims: Patsy J. Moriarty is the owner of the property located at 315 W Railroad Dr, Huachuca City, AZ 85616, which corresponds to parcel 106-47-058A ([Zillow](https://www.zillow.com/homedetails/315-W-Railroad-Dr-Huachuca-City-AZ-85616/333362026_zpid/)). The property contains a manufactured home built in 2007 ([Zillow](https://www.zillow.com/homedetails/315-W-Railroad-Dr-Huachuca-City-AZ-85616/333362026_zpid/)). No public records of civic engagement or stance on development were found.

approach_recommendations.engage: Meet with her in person on her property, showing respect for her rural lifestyle and listening to any concerns she may have about changes in the area.

neighbors.name: Adam Chabal
neighbors.claims: Adam Chabal is the recorded owner of parcel 106-47-058B, located at 300 W Railroad Dr, Huachuca City, AZ 85616 ([Zillow](https://www.zillow.com/homedetails/300-W-Railroad-Dr-Huachuca-City-AZ-85616/333362027_zpid/)). Real estate records indicate the property was sold in December 2025 ([Zillow](https://www.zillow.com/homedetails/300-W-Railroad-Dr-Huachuca-City-AZ-85616/333362027_zpid/)). There is no public information on Chabal taking part in local boards or forum discussions.

approach_recommendations.engage: Reach out directly to introduce the project and ask for his input, as he has no known stance. A straightforward, personal approach can help address any questions from this relatively new neighbor.
